name: Endless Crazy Fart - Flick To Fly Faraway
name_original: Endless Crazy Fart - Flick To Fly Faraway
description:
Our good buddy Duke is very special.
He can use the fart let him fly.
When he wanted to fly farther and higher
Please help him.
You can get more than 20 achievements to prove oneself.

Tips:
- Use the props, skills.
- Unlock the achievements.
